execution_plan.description: Retrieve each customer's first name, middle initial, last name and their payment method codes. Include customers even if they have no payment methods.
execution_plan.query: SELECT c.customer_first_name, c.customer_middle_initial, c.customer_last_name, pm.payment_method_code FROM customers c LEFT JOIN customer_payment_methods pm ON c.customer_id = pm.customer_id;
